title: Hi, I am using the Sudio Nio earphones. The sound via Bluetooth does not go very high.
content:
I am using the Sudio Nio earphones. They fit great and the sound volume is fine when I'm listening to calls. However when I am listening to music or audiobooks the sound is soft. If I'm walking on the road with them I can't make out the words of the audiobook.

I have turned on the "Disable maximum sound" option but there is no change in volume thur far.

Seek your assistance.
